title: C++中的二进制技巧
content:
判断-1

int i = -1; 
// means the binary expression of i is 111111111···11
// at the same time the '~' operation flip every bit of i
// then the binary expression of i is 000000000···000
assert(~i == 0);
cout << i << endl;

判断1个数

//1

//system buildin function __builtin_popcount()
int a = 1234124;  
//binary expression is 100101101010011001100
cout << __builtin_popcount(a) << endl;
//tht outcome is 10

//2

//use the math
//the operation i & (i - 1) 
int i = 1234124;
//binary expression is 100101101010011001100
//also i-1 is          100101101010011001011
//the the & operation  100101101010011001000
//see! the last 1 is gone
int cnt = 0;
while(i){
    i &= (i-1);
    cnt++;
}
cout << cnt << endl;
//the outcome is 10
